message.name: Your Name
message.formNameTooShort: Your name must be at least 2 characters
message.formPhone: Please enter a valid phone number (use - for area code)
message.formEmail: Please enter a valid email address
message.formMessageTooShort: Your message must be at least 5 characters
message.submitSuccessContent: I will check your message, thank you for your message.

signin.init: System initialization, please register your account

basicFormHint.name: Name must not be empty
basicFormHint.url: URL must include a protocol (http, https)
basicFormHint.siteTitle: Site title must be at least 2 characters and cannot be empty
basicFormHint.fullName: Full name must be at least 2 characters and cannot be empty
basicFormHint.position: Position or professional title must be at least 2 characters and cannot be empty

site.title: Site Information
site.description: Set up basic site information to improve SEO quality
site.iconDesc: The site icon displayed in the browser tab, supports common formats like ico, png, svg
site.siteTitleDesc: The site name displayed in the browser tab
site.descDesc: Search engines will read this information and use it as the summary in search results
site.recordedPlaceholder: Please enter the site record number
site.recordedDesc: According to regulations in Mainland China, the domain record number must be displayed at the bottom of the page (fill in based on deployment location)

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: The personal information section on the left side of the homepage, where you can configure your avatar, name, position, and custom personal tags
personal.name: Name
personal.positionPlaceholder: Please enter your position or major
personal.positionDesc: For example, Frontend Developer, Data Engineer

introduction.title: Personal Introduction
introduction.description: Provide a more detailed introduction about your experiences, personality, hobbies, and thoughts so that others can get to know you faster

skill.title: Professional Skills
skill.description: List specific skills and certifications within your professional field to help others quickly understand your expertise

postTable.titlePlaceholder: Please enter a title to search
postTable.title: Title

postEdit.title: Content Title
postEdit.abstractDesc: Search engines will read this information and use it as the summary in search results
postEdit.footerDesc: Displayed at the bottom of the text content, centered (e.g., copyright notice, disclaimer)
postEdit.footerDefaultContent: Â© Copyright belongs to the author. Please indicate the original link when reposting.
postEdit.formTitle: Name must be at least 2 characters and cannot be empty
postEdit.formFooter: Footer information supports up to 30 characters

messages.title: Message List
messages.description: Messages left by visitors on your homepage

resource.title: Resource Management
resource.name: Resource Name
resource.deleteHint: Deleted resources will be permanently lost. If they are currently in use, they may not be accessible. Please proceed with caution!

log.title: Access Logs
log.IPPlaceholder: Please enter the full IP to search
log.IPDesc: Visitor IPs may be affected by various factors, and accuracy cannot be guaranteed. For reference only.
log.deleteHint: Only visitor logs can be deleted
log.clearLogsHint: This action will delete all 'Visitor Access' log records. Please proceed with caution!

password.title: Admin Password
password.pwdDesc: The login password you are currently using
password.newPwdDesc: Supports 5 to 12 characters, including numbers, letters, and underscores
password.confirmPwdPlaceholder: Please re-enter the new login password
password.confirmPwdDesc: Re-enter the new password for confirmation
password.confirmPwdError: Confirmation password error, please check and try again

language.title: Language Settings
language.description: Supports multiple languages to meet the needs of users in different regions
language.desc: Takes effect after refreshing the page

about.title: About the Project
about.description: If you have any questions or issues, you can submit feedback in the project's original repository.

tag.iconRemark: It is recommended to use black SVG icons. In dark mode, they will automatically convert to white.
tag.name: Name
tag.linkHint: After configuring an external link, clicking the element will preview the link address
tag.linkHintContent: (Note: Protocol type must be included, e.g., https://github.com)

common.saveSuccessContent: Takes effect after the user refreshes the page
common.deleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete?
common.deleteContent: This action cannot be undone, and the data will be permanently deleted from the database!

hint.req429: Hey, you're doing that too often. Take a break and try again later.
hint.req401: Authentication failed. Please log in again.
hint.reqError: Request error. Please check and try again.
hint.fileLimit: File size exceeds the maximum limit.
hint.fileTooLarge: {fileName} exceeds the maximum upload limit of {maxSize}. Upload failed.
hint.notFound: This is not a valid URL. Please check and try again.
